Xiangshan district of Huaibei city 淮北市[Huai2 bei3 shi4], Anhui

sentences.english: The staurolite schist and cordierite schist have been discovered in northern Xiangshan area for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 在相山北部首次发现十字石片岩及堇青石片岩。

sentences.english: Xiangshan uranium ore-field is a famous hydrothermal uranium ore-field.
sentences.chinese: 相山矿田是我国著名的大型热液铀矿田。

sentences.english: Word set has "strong Village Series, " the "mountain lay with the word" two volumes.
sentences.chinese: 词集有《彊村丛书》本《相山居士词》二卷。
